entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Enterprise
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 7:56 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 36. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 36. Wind chill minus 51 this evening and minus 46 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 6:27 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022
